topics.body:
So the Boston Bomber had a verdict of guilty on all accounts.


Also that police officer that shot that unnarmed suspect is most definitively going to be charged with first degree murder.  The good news is that the police chief for the district is going to require that all police officers in his district wear cameras at all times and all officers are being investigated currently to see if any other officers have done anything similar.  Fortunately the police district is taking this matter very seriously and not trying to cover up any evidence.

Short version is the police district is on the prosecutors' side and interrogating all police officers to find out if this was or wasn't a isolated incident and all police officers for the district will now have to wear cameras at all times.

Tl:dr; South Carolina's police shooting isn't another Ferguson.
